## What & Why

**The Problem:** Developers often struggle with repetitive tasks that slow down their workflow and reduce productivity.

**Our Solution:** awesome-project automates these tasks, giving you more time to focus on what matters - writing great code.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Install globally
npm install -g awesome-project

# Or use npx
npx awesome-project init
```

## Documentation

For full documentation, visit our [Wiki](https://github.com/user/awesome-project/wiki/Home).

### Basic Usage

```javascript
import { awesome } from 'awesome-project';

const result = awesome.doSomething({
  option: 'value'
});

console.log(result);
```
